name: Corrupt - After the Fall
description:
Tartarus Fall - that's where the worst enemies of the government are sent.

Many would say that Tartarus Fall actually means certain death: not a single soul that has passed through its gates was ever seen or heard of again. 

But the truth is far worse. 

Sinking through the depths of their own minds, every prisoner is condemned to pass the eternity in the company of their utmost fears.

Meet Chinaski, a former revolutionary soldier and marksman, and help him escape the inhumane horror of the most infamous prison of the world.

I dare you.

********

Hello, y'all! Heiko there! This one is actually my first "serious" game: despite being a school project (in a really early stage of development, tbh), I'm really looking forward to continue and finish this project.  Since I'm just a one-guy team, I would really appreciate any help and suggestion you guys could offer. That's it! Hope you enjoy!
